name: Aliens Vs Bunker
description:
Done for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

It’s been three months since your team arrived on this unknown planet, and two weeks since HQ last sent you food. People are starting to starve! It's your mission to take food from the aliens and bring it to the bunker. But beware! The aliens found out about your plan and are now attacking the bunker! Use the ARROW KEYS to move around and the SPACE KEY to grab the food and start the minigames. Good luck!

Character Designer - José Cruz

Background and objects - Sofia Pougy

Colorist- Maru Serpa

Game Design and Story - Cael Barbosa

Sound Designer and Composer - Rafael Musa

Programing - Bruno Colaço, Koch
